import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { fetchProducts, setFilters, clearFilters } from '../store/slices/productSlice'; import { FaSearch, FaFilter, FaShieldAlt, FaComments, FaRocket, FaMobileAlt, FaLaptop, FaHeadphones, FaCamera, FaGamepad, FaHome, FaMicrochip, FaArrowRight, FaStar, FaHeart, FaEye } from 'react-icons/fa'; import ProductCard from '../components/ProductCard'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { products, loading, filters } = useSelector((state) => state.products); const { isAuthenticated } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [showFilters, setShowFilters] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchProducts(filters)); }, [dispatch]); const categories = [ { name: 'Smartphones', icon: FaMobileAlt, color: '#3B82F6' }, { name: 'Laptops', icon: FaLaptop, color: '#10B981' }, { name: 'Tablets', icon: FaMicrochip, color: '#8B5CF6' }, { name: 'Gaming', icon: FaGamepad, color: '#F59E0B' }, { name: 'Audio', icon: FaHeadphones, color: '#EF4444' }, { name: 'Cameras', icon: FaCamera, color: '#06B6D4' }, { name: 'Smart Home', icon: FaHome, color: '#84CC16' }, { name: 'Other', icon: FaMicrochip, color: '#6B7280' } ]; const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchQuery.trim()) { dispatch(setFilters({ search: searchQuery })); dispatch(fetchProducts({ ...filters, search: searchQuery })); } }; const selectCategory = (category) => { dispatch(setFilters({ category })); dispatch(fetchProducts({ ...filters, category })); }; const handleClearFilters = () => { setSearchQuery(''); dispatch(clearFilters()); dispatch(fetchProducts({})); }; const featuredProducts = products.slice(0, 6); return (

dispatch(setFilters({ minPrice: e.target.value }))} /> to dispatch(setFilters({ maxPrice: e.target.value }))} />
)} {/* Toggle Filters Button */}
); }; export default Home;
